meaning: a vulnerable spot or weakness

meaning: the best future life partner for someone

meaning: a possession that is worthy

s_l_brkt: I'm open to trying any buoyant object, [[whatever floats my boat]] on the lake
s_f: When it comes to choosing a hobby, I believe in whatever floats my boat
s_l: I'm open to trying any buoyant object, whatever floats my boat on the lake
p_l_hu_gpt: Nyitott vagyok arra, hogy bármilyen úszó tárgyat kipróbáljak, ami felhajtja a hajómat a tóban.
p_a_ko_gpt: 내 배를 띄우는 것이 무엇이든 상관없어.
p_f_ko_gpt: 취미를 선택할 때, 내가 좋아하는 것을 선택하는 것이 중요하다고 생각합니다.

meaning: when a situation gets out of control and everything starts to go wrong
s_f_brkt: After a series of setbacks, [[the wheels fell off]] our project
s_l_brkt: Due to a manufacturing defect, [[the wheels fell off]] the toy car
s_f: After a series of setbacks, the wheels fell off our project
s_l: Due to a manufacturing defect, the wheels fell off the toy car
p_l_hu_gpt: Egy gyártási hiba miatt leesett a játékautó kereke.
p_f_ko_gpt: 일련의 실패 끝에, 우리 프로젝트는 망가졌다.

meaning: when a situation is urgent or desperate.
s_f_brkt: He always comes through [[when the chips are down]] and we need him the most
s_l_brkt: The poker game gets intense [[when the chips are down]] on the table
s_f: He always comes through when the chips are down and we need him the most
s_l: The poker game gets intense when the chips are down on the table
p_l_hu_gpt: A pókerjáték izgalmassá válik, amikor a zsetonok az asztalon vannak.
p_f_ko_gpt: 그는 항상 어려운 상황에서 우리가 그를 가장 필요로 할 때 도와줍니다.

idiom: where the rubber meets the road
meaning: when you have to face your challenges
s_f_brkt: The new employee will face a real challenge [[where the rubber meets the road]] in the upcoming project
s_l_brkt: The intersection is [[where the rubber meets the road]] as cars pass by
s_f: The new employee will face a real challenge where the rubber meets the road in the upcoming project
s_l: The intersection is where the rubber meets the road as cars pass by
s_a: where the rubber meets the road
p_l_hu_gpt: Az útkereszteződés az a hely, ahol az autók elhaladása során a gumi találkozik az úttal.
p_f_ko_gpt: 새로운 직원은 다가오는 프로젝트에서 타이어가 도로와 만나는 곳에서 실제적인 도전을 마주하게 될 것입니다.

meaning: to try to hide your fear in a scary or dangerous situation
s_f_brkt: He [[was whistling in the dark]] when he tried to reassure us about the uncertain future
s_l_brkt: While walking through the forest at night, she [[was whistling in the dark]] to keep her spirits up
s_f: He was whistling in the dark when he tried to reassure us about the uncertain future
s_l: While walking through the forest at night, she was whistling in the dark to keep her spirits up
p_l_hu_gpt: Miközben az erdőn sétált éjjel, fütyült a sötétben, hogy fenn tartsa a lelkiállapotát.
p_f_ko_gpt: 그는 불확실한 미래에 대해 우리를 안심시키려고 할 때 어둠 속에서 휘파람을 불었다.

meaning: official report or guide
s_f_brkt: [[She read the white paper]] to understand the company 's new policy
s_l_brkt: [[She read the white paper]] to check for any ink smudges
s_f: She read the white paper to understand the company 's new policy
s_l: She read the white paper to check for any ink smudges
p_l_hu_gpt: Olvasta a fehér papírt, hogy ellenőrizze, van-e rajta tintafolt.
p_f_ko_gpt: 그녀는 회사의 새로운 정책을 이해하기 위해 백지를 읽었습니다.

meaning: everything, all of something
s_f_brkt: [[She went the whole nine yards]] to make his birthday special
s_l_brkt: The fabric store required her to buy the fabric in bulk, so [[she went the whole nine yards]]
s_f: She went the whole nine yards to make his birthday special
s_l: The fabric store required her to buy the fabric in bulk, so she went the whole nine yards
s_a: She went the whole nine yards
p_l_hu_gpt: Az anyagbolt kötelezte őt arra, hogy nagy mennyiségben vásárolja meg az anyagot, így végül mindent beleadott.
p_f_ko_gpt: 그녀는 그의 생일을 특별하게 만들기 위해 모든 것을 다 했다.

meaning: there's no chance that something will work; to be unsuccessful
s_f_brkt: He proposed a risky investment, but we knew [[that idea will never fly]] with the board
s_l_brkt: The broken-winged bird was injured, and sadly, [[that idea will never fly]] again
s_f: He proposed a risky investment, but we knew that idea will never fly with the board
s_l: The broken-winged bird was injured, and sadly, that idea will never fly again
p_l_hu_gpt: A sérült szárnyú madár megsérült, és sajnos az az ötlet sosem fog újra repülni.
p_a_ko_gpt: 그 아이디어는 결코 성공하지 않을 것입니다.
p_f_ko_gpt: 그는 위험한 투자를 제안했지만, 우리는 그 아이디어가 이사회에서는 절대로 통하지 않을 것을 알고 있었다.

meaning: to make a fresh start and forget all past offences, disagreements or mistakes
s_f_brkt: After a long discussion, they [[wiped the slate clean together]] and started fresh
s_l_brkt: The teacher and student [[wiped the slate clean together]] after the lesson
s_f: After a long discussion, they wiped the slate clean together and started fresh
s_l: The teacher and student wiped the slate clean together after the lesson
p_l_hu_gpt: A tanár és a diák együtt törölte le a táblát az óra után.
p_f_ko_gpt: 긴 토론 끝에, 그들은 함께 모든 것을 다 지우고 새로 시작했다.

meaning: the person who finishes last in a race or competition receives an imaginary prize
s_f_brkt: Our team [[received a wooden spoon]] for finishing last in the competition
s_l_brkt: As a gift for her new kitchen, she [[received a wooden spoon]] from her friend
s_f: Our team received a wooden spoon for finishing last in the competition
s_l: As a gift for her new kitchen, she received a wooden spoon from her friend
p_l_hu_gpt: Ajándékként az új konyhájához barátjától egy fa kanalat kapott.
p_f_ko_gpt: 우리 팀은 대회에서 마지막을 하여 나무 숟가락을 받았습니다.

meaning: the presence of something very bad in the best
s_f_brkt: Despite the company's success, [[they found a worm in the apple]] when they discovered the corruption
s_l_brkt: While eating their fruit, [[they found a worm in the apple]] and felt disgusted
s_f: Despite the company's success, they found a worm in the apple when they discovered the corruption
s_l: While eating their fruit, they found a worm in the apple and felt disgusted
s_a: they found a worm in the apple
p_l_hu_gpt: Miközben ettek a gyümölcsükből, egy kukacot találtak az almában és undorodtak.
p_f_ko_gpt: 회사가 성공했음에도 불구하고, 부패를 발견하면서 그들은 사과 속에서 벌레를 발견했다.

meaning: to be too ashamed or embarrassed of something
s_f_brkt: She [[wouldn't be seen dead in that]] outfit, as it was completely out of style
s_l_brkt: As a vampire, he [[wouldn't be seen dead in that]] garlic-infused restaurant
s_f: She wouldn't be seen dead in that outfit, as it was completely out of style
s_l: As a vampire, he wouldn't be seen dead in that garlic-infused restaurant
s_a: wouldn't be seen dead in that
p_l_hu_gpt: Vámpírként nem látnák halottan sem abban a fokhagymás étteremben.
p_a_ko_gpt: 그걸 입고 나오는 건 죽어도 싫어.
p_f_ko_gpt: 그녀는 그 옷으로는 죽어도 입지 않을 것이다. 완전히 시대에 뒤떨어졌기 때문이다.

meaning: to be overprotective towards somebody
s_f_brkt: She was always [[wrapped in cotton wool]] by her overprotective parents
s_l_brkt: The fragile vase was [[wrapped in cotton wool]] before being placed in the box
s_f: She was always wrapped in cotton wool by her overprotective parents
s_l: The fragile vase was wrapped in cotton wool before being placed in the box
p_l_hu_gpt: A törékeny váza pamutvattába volt csomagolva, mielőtt a dobozba került.
p_f_ko_gpt: 그녀는 항상 지나치게 보호적인 부모님에 의해 면봉으로 감싸여 있었습니다.

meaning: when someone's feelings or thoughts are very clear
s_f_brkt: Her excitement was [[written all over her face]] when she received the good news
s_l_brkt: The prankster had drawn doodles and words, which were [[written all over her face]], while she slept
s_f: Her excitement was written all over her face when she received the good news
s_l: The prankster had drawn doodles and words, which were written all over her face, while she slept
p_l_hu_gpt: A tréfamester rajzokat és szavakat rajzolt az arcára, miközben aludt.
p_f_ko_gpt: 그녀는 좋은 소식을 받았을 때 얼굴 전체에 흥분이 쓰여 있었다.

meaning: people who  have an inclination towards being fainthearted.
s_f_brkt: He never stands up for himself and always [[has a yellow streak]]
s_l_brkt: The painting [[has a yellow streak]] running through the middle
s_f: He never stands up for himself and always has a yellow streak
s_l: The painting has a yellow streak running through the middle
p_l_hu_gpt: A festmény közepén egy sárga csík fut.
p_f_ko_gpt: 그는 자신을 위해 일어서지 않고 항상 겁쟁이입니다.

idiom: you can't have cake and the topping, too
meaning: you can't have everything the way you want it, especially if your desires are contradictory
s_f_brkt: She wanted to stay home and go to the party, but she [[can't have the cake and the topping, too]]
s_l_brkt: Due to her strict diet, she [[can't have the cake and the topping, too]]
s_f: She wanted to stay home and go to the party, but she can't have the cake and the topping, too
s_l: Due to her strict diet, she can't have the cake and the topping, too
s_a: can't have the cake and the topping, too
p_l_hu_gpt: Az ő szigorú diétája miatt nem eheti meg a tortát és a tetejét sem.
p_a_ko_gpt: 케이크와 토핑을 모두 가질 수는 없어요.
p_f_ko_gpt: 그녀는 집에 머무르고 파티에 가고 싶었지만, 케이크와 토핑을 모두 먹을 수는 없다.

idiom: you can't have your cake and eat it
meaning: you can't have things both ways
s_f_brkt: You [[can't have the cake and eat it]] when it comes to maintaining a high-paying job and having ample free time
s_l_brkt: At the cake decorating competition, participants [[can't have the cake and eat it]] as they must present their creations to the judges
s_f: You can't have the cake and eat it when it comes to maintaining a high-paying job and having ample free time
s_l: At the cake decorating competition, participants can't have the cake and eat it as they must present their creations to the judges
s_a: can't have the cake and eat it
p_l_hu_gpt: A tortadíszítő versenyen a résztvevők nem ehetik meg a tortát, mivel bemutatják alkotásaikat a bíráknak.
p_f_ko_gpt: 고수입 직업을 유지하면서 충분한 여가 시간을 가질 수는 없습니다.

meaning: if you do bad things to people, bad things will happen to you, or good things if you do good things
s_f_brkt: If you treat people poorly, you'll [[reap what you sow]] when they don't help you in return
s_l_brkt: After planting the seeds, the farmer knew it was time to [[reap what you sow]]
s_f: If you treat people poorly, you'll reap what you sow when they don't help you in return
s_l: After planting the seeds, the farmer knew it was time to reap what you sow
p_l_hu_gpt: A magok elültetése után a gazda tudta, hogy eljött az ideje annak, hogy arassuk azt, amit elvetettünk.
p_f_ko_gpt: 당신이 사람들을 나쁘게 대하면, 그들이 도와주지 않을 때 당신이 뿌린 대로 거둘 것입니다.

meaning: to ask someone to shut up
s_f_brkt: When she started talking about the secret, he told her [[to zip it up]]
s_l_brkt: Before leaving the house, she made sure [[to zip it up]] her jacket
s_f: When she started talking about the secret, he told her to zip it up
s_l: Before leaving the house, she made sure to zip it up her jacket
p_l_hu_gpt: Mielőtt elhagyta a házat, ellenőrizte, hogy felhúzta-e a dzsekijét.
p_f_ko_gpt: 그녀가 비밀에 대해 말하기 시작하자, 그는 그녀에게 입을 다물라고 말했다.
